docs.title: Welcome page 👋
docs.text:
Data Science Projects 📚 Welcome to MyPortfolio!

I'm Krzysztof, and I'm really grateful to have you here on my site.

Your visit means a lot! Nice to see you here 😊

Projects

To see projects, please see sidebar on the right. This portfolio have projects

  • Data4Apps
  • Data4Play
  • Tablo
About Me

Currently, I am focused on improving my analytical skills by learning:

  • Python 🐍
  • SQL 🗃️
  • Machine Learning 🔑
  • Tableau/Power BI 📊
My Current Job

I work as a GL Accountant where my main responsibilities are:

  • Preparing reports and reconciliations 📊
  • Ensuring accurate entries in SAP 💻
  • Optimizing efficiency in work through macros, formulas, and scripts 💡
My Education

I am enrolled on the DataScience Course organised by GoToIt 🎓

I hold a master's degree in Accounting and Economic Analytics, which has equipped me with a solid foundation in financial management and analytical skills. 🎓

docs.title: Data4Play 💻
docs.text:
AI Data Science Learning App Data4Play 💻

This application support you with teachnig data science with AI. My app offers three modes to learn: Normal, Game and Creator Mode. This app offers: Interactive Chats, Engaging Challenges and Learning Paths. I have learnt thanks to this:

  • Python
  • Streamlit
  • Using AI Model
Please see my github link here.

docs.title: Data4Apps 🕵️‍♀️
docs.text:
Friendship App Data4Apps 🕵️‍♀️

This application show you interactive analysis. My app offers four interactive data analysis of four datasets: Titanic, Company, Survey and Marathon. I have learnt thanks to this:

  • Python (functions, logics, streamlit)
  • Data processing (pandas, matplotlib, seaborn)
  • Machine Learning (Pycaret, classification)
  • Deploying
Please see my app link here.

Please see my git link here.

docs.title: Mini Projects ✨
docs.text:
Tableau Project Mini Projects ✨ Tablo 🔎

Welcome to my Tableau project where data comes to life through interactive visualizations. This Tableau project offers in-depth analysis and visualization of sales data. Explore the following features to enhance your understanding of the data Interactive Dashboards and Data Filters. Please see the project on Tableau Public here.

Python miniprojects 💎

Please see 4 MiniApps in this folder. Apps:

Data4Iris - Iris EDA analyse with MLL as an app! 💐

Data4Create - Create your own ChatApp with AI! 💎

Data4Predict (Beta) - Create your own MLL model! 📳

Data4Catch - Catch your invoice to numbers 📝

Please see code of projects on github here.
